TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SpeakProgressEventArgs extends System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEventArgs

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AudioPosition As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan AudioPosition { TimeSpan get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the audio position of the event.

value.span: 返回音频输出流中的事件的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of the event in the audio output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 规范化数字与对应于如何数将会被朗读的单词。The normalizes numbers to the words that correspond to how the number will be spoken. 例如，合成器说出号"4003"作为"四个三个"。For example, the synthesizer speaks the number "4003" as "four thousand three". 它会发出说出的单词，并返回每个事件每个单词。It raises a event for each of the spoken words, and returns the for each word.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CharacterCount As Integer
public: property int CharacterCount { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取事件引发之前刚刚说出的单词中的字符数。

span.span: Gets the number of characters in the word that was spoken just before the event was raised.

value.span: 返回引发事件之前讲出的单词中的字符数。

span.span: Returns the number of characters in the word that was spoken just before the event was raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 规范化数字与对应于如何数将会被朗读的单词。The normalizes numbers to the words that correspond to how the number will be spoken. 例如，合成器说出号"4003"作为"四个三个"。For example, the synthesizer speaks the number "4003" as "four thousand three". 它会发出说出的单词的每个事件。It raises a event for each of the spoken words. 但是，的三个单词的每个属性是相同。However, the property for each of the three words is the same. 在这种情况下，是计数中的字符数"4003"文本中出现提示时，四个。It is the count of the characters in the number "4003" in the text of the prompt, in this case, four.

public: property int CharacterPosition { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取从提示开始到刚刚说出的单词的第一字母之前的位置的字符与空格数。

span.span: Gets the number of characters and spaces from the beginning of the prompt to the position before the first letter of the word that was just spoken.

value.span: 返回从提示符开始到刚刚讲出的单词的第一个字母前的字符和空格数。

span.span: Returns the number of characters and spaces from the beginning of the prompt to the position before the first letter of the word that was just spoken.

summary.span: 引发事件时只读的文本。

span.span: The text that was just spoken when the event was raised.

value.span: 返回引发事件时朗读的文本。

span.span: Returns the text that was just spoken when the event was raised.
